name: IRS - Infinite Record Sorter
description:
This game was made in less than 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50. The theme was "Delay the Inevitable". Thank you for playing!

[ A Message From Your Boss ]

Hey kid… welcome to your first day at the IRS.

April 16th ain’t a great day for us historically speaking, but I’m sure you’ll be fine.

Job’s simple. Just take the forms coming off the line here and stick ‘em in the right pile.

I’ll come back and inspect your sorting every now and then, but don’t sweat it too much. Definitely don’t need all the forms sorted correctly. Let’s just say… half the forms? Yeah, that’s good enough for government work.

Here’s your official grab-o-matic to do the job. It’s top secret tech kid, so don’t go blabbin’ about it when you get home.

Whatever you do, just make sure you don’t miss any forms before they reach the end of the conveyor.

You can be a pretty lousy sorter, but they’ll pretty much fire you right on the spot for missing a few forms.

Harsh, I know. I don’t make the rules kid, I just enforce ‘em.

Anyway, I’ll be back in a bit, good luck.

Controls

WASD / Arrows - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Click - Tether a Form

Right Click - Release Tethers
